files.help:
Alias xonsh to use a custom configuration location:

```bash
alias xonsh="xonsh --rc $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/xonsh/xonshrc"
```

Supported natively.

You can move the file to _$XDG_DATA_HOME/oh-my-xonsh_ by adding the following to your xonshrc file:

```python
# set where oh-my-xonsh lives
if not 'OMX_HOME' in ${...}:
    $OMX_HOME = p"~/.oh-my-xonsh"

# clone omx if needed
if not pf"{$OMX_HOME}".exists():
    git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/oh-my-xonsh/oh-my-xonsh $OMX_HOME

# source oh-my-xonsh to give you the `omx` object
source $OMX_HOME/oh-my-xonsh.xsh
```
